20101223070823.000|20101223070825.000|CC1|SOME PEOPLE SEE LIFE, LIBERTY   
20101223070825.000|20101223070828.000|CC1|AND THE PURSUIT OF HAPPINESS AS

20101223070831.000|20101223070833.000|CC1|THEM AS MENU OPTIONS.

20101223070835.000|20101223070836.000|CC1|WHO SELL THEIR REPRODUCTION

20101223072250.000|20101223072251.000|CC1|AND ALSO NOBODY BOTHERED YOU.   
20101223072251.000|20101223072253.000|CC1|I WAS FROM A RURAL AREA THAT HAD
20101223072253.000|20101223072256.000|CC1|NO LIGHTS AND IT WAS DARK ALL   
20101223072256.000|20101223072257.000|CC1|ALL THE TIME.

20101223072258.000|20101223072300.000|CC1|ALWAYS ON AND THERE WAS ALWAYS  
20101223072300.000|20101223072301.000|CC1|ACTION.

20101223072302.000|20101223072303.000|CC1|LIKE BACK THEN?
